abstract: Lions Gate Entertainment sued Carl C. Icahn over his past opposition to a deal with MGM, contending that the billionaire investor was “secretly plotting” to merge the studios.
snippet: Lions Gate Entertainment sued Carl C. Icahn over his past opposition to a deal with MGM, contending that the billionaire investor was “secretly plotting” to merge the studios.
lead_paragraph: Lions Gate Entertainment is still angry at the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, even if they now agree that the movie studio should merge with Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer.

headline.main: Lions Gate Sues Icahn Over MGM Deal
